channel.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
channel.description:
(Prince) ## <FONT COLOR="#8b00ff">Executive</FONT>
Unseen Offensive
Abilities
Passive: Royal Blood: [Only usable upon the death of a king] As a Royal, you can put your name forward for nominations to become the next King.
Day: Lock up: Lock up a person in a cell for tonight (Looks like prince cell) but you can't see what they say and you can't talk (3 uses) (If fails, it will not take a use)
Day: Search!: Search a Player for their journal allowing you to read it. (2 uses)
Night: Interrogate: Visit the Cell at night and talk to the person in the cell as if you were the prince (You will appears as the prince) (Can't be stopped via Occupy) (2 uses)
Night: Command: Command a Player to visit another player (Counts as occupation, so anyone immune to occupation will be immune to it). They will know if this happens (5 Uses)
(Alchemist)
## <FONT COLOR="#8b00ff">Plague Doctor</FONT>
Unseen Support
Passive: Safety of the Mask: With your mask you are immune to poison. You are also immune to your first attack.
Day: Fake Nightshade: Make a player think that they have been poisoned (2 uses)
Night: Sleeping Gas: Fill a player's room with sleeping gas making them be occupied as well as another visitors. (3 uses)
Night: Potion of Strength: Give your assassin a potion of strength allowing him to bypass night immunity (2 uses)
(Reaper)
## <FONT COLOR="#8b00ff">The Haunt </FONT>
Unseen Offensive
Passive: It's silent here: You can't be whispered to.
Passive: A mere spirit: You can't talk, vote, or become king while "dead"
Day: Stalk: Stalk a player for the day seeing what the whisper and who they use their abilities on (3 uses)
Day: Consume Soul: Consume a Soul to come back alive for a day negating all of your passives (Special)
Night: Cloak of Darkness: Cloak a player in darkness making them appears suspicious to investigators, OR cloak a unseen member in darkness to make them appear good to investigators. (3 uses)
Night: Dream Haunt: Haunt a player's dream as another player, making them unable to visit the person who appeared in their dream until you use this ability on another player. (3 uses)
(Possessor)
## <FONT COLOR="#8b00ff">Body Snatcher</FONT>
Unseen Special
Passive: Blackened Shield: Immune to Death at Night
Night: Body Theft: Steal a Person's body, killing them then placing you into their body with their unseen counterpart.
(Fool)
## <FONT COLOR="#8b00ff">Lunatic</FONT>
Unseen Wildcard
Passive: Curse of Insanity: One person who votes guilty when you are being executed (random) will be instantly converted.
Day: Surprise!: If a player uses a day ability they will stead use it on you. (3 Uses)
Day: Troll Box: Choose a target player and whisper a short phrase into the troll box. It will appear as if that player said it. (2 uses)
Night: Dirty Work: Forage for the Assassin (3 uses)
(Scorned)
## <FONT COLOR="#8b00ff">Forsaken</FONT>
Unseen Social
Passive: Alone: Due to you being alone you lock your door at night (Immune to Visitors)
Day: Forged Vote: Make a player vote for another player, they are unable to revert this (3 uses)
Night: Blind Eyes: Make a player receive their information late from the night (Infinite Uses)

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
yeah, because then it makes it so the haunt cant stalk and be ‘alive’ that day

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I would make consume soul a day ability. It would be more useful and would avoid the 3 night ability problem. Otherwise he is good. I like the Executive change too btw.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
ok

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: Braixen
item.description:
That was kind-of the plan ;3

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
^ opinions on haunt

otherwise, I still think the haunt is fine

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
[a] is the first target, the one who’s dream is being haunted, and [b] is the second target, the one who is appearing in [a]'s haunted dreams
instead of [a] being unable to visit [b] and [b] being unable to visit [a], i think that it should only be [a] is unable to visit [b], because it makes sense that [a] can visit [b], because they’re too scared, and I see no reason why [b] cant visit [a]

if you want to keep the effect, maybe change it to be “you haunt the dreams of [a] and [b], appearing as the other, making them unable to visit each other until you use this ability on another player”

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: Braixen
item.description:
Opinion on the Haunt?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
1 more change to executive
make it so, if for whatever reason lock up fails, it doesnt take up a use, and interrogate is unaffected by occupations

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: Braixen
item.description:
Haunt has 3 night abilities now and Executive was changed ;3

Opinions please ;3

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: Braixen
item.description:
• Change Executive
  • Don’t Change Executive

0 voters

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
So you’re saying nearly no role is immune to conversion for next SFoL?

That will be interesting.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
If it’s just for FoL don’t clutter actual ToL suggestions with it

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
It has the exact same text as the normal reaper. And even if it doesn’t my point still stands

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
reap ability doesnt say it gives a soul

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
By the time he is converted he will probably have like 5. That would last the whole game plus the 2 from the reap ability. His abilitys also give the unseen a bs amount of voting power.

Also just making sure you realize that without Executes, jailing is a glorified roleblock

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
Braixen:

Something absurd for a sfol game.

Braixen:

Night: Blind Eyes: Blind a Player making their first 15 seconds in the day appear to be black. (Infinite Uses)

timed abilities dont really work in sfol

Braixen:

In gulf

also ingulf is one word

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: Braixen
item.description:
Too powerful in my opinion

Also you do realize that once the amount of souls that the haunt has wears out it dies?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
The haunt seems OP and the Executive seems too different from the Prince. I’m not sure what to do about the haunt but the Executive should get a jail but lose the Execute from Prince. The name should stay Prince in jail chat

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: Braixen
item.description:
Opinions?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Oh ok! Sounds good to me!

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: Braixen
item.description:
Something absurd for a sfol game.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] Nonconvertible class's unseen class (POC)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
What exactly is this for? I get that it’s a proof of concept but what are you trying to prove?

Read full topic
